Clockwork:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add #b

Clockwork:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: After you play a card, increase its damage and Block by #b

Clockwork:RampUp.NAME: Ramp Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card this turn gain #b
Dexterity until the end of the turn.

Clockwork:Stasis.NAME: Stasis
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to or by you for #b
